# NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility.all

**Case**

A representation visibility specification conferring item visibility to all processes.

## Declaration

```swift
case all
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility.group**: A representation visibility specification confining item visibility to the app’s app group.
- **NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility.ownProcess**: A representation visibility specification confining item visibility to the app that is the source of the item.
- **NSItemProviderRepresentationVisibility.team**: A representation visibility specification confining item visibility to processes created by the app’s development team.
